Spica.name: Spica
Spica.description: A fixed ship that cannot move on its own.

Shrink.name: Shrink
Shrink.description: Remove scaffold and merge rightmost part to the left.

Shrink_Flipped.name: Shrink
Shrink_Flipped.description: Remove scaffold and merge leftmost part to the right.

FixedStar.name: FIXED STAR
description: At the start of your turn, add <c=card>Shrink</c> to your hand.
Evade will move the cannon instead of the ship

Albireo.name: Albireo
Albireo.description: A double tempered ship that harness the energy of double stars.

DoubleStar.name: DOUBLE STAR
description: Two zones will appear and add <c=card>Relative Motion</c> at the start of the combat.
If the ship is inside orange zone, <c=action>all cards do its action twice</c> and <c=downside>gain 1 less energy next turn.</c>
If the ship is inside blue zone, <c=action>all attacks generate</c> <c=status>Stun</c> and gain 1 more energy next turn.
If there is a Binary Star, artifact is temporarily disabled.

AlbireoA.title: BLUE STAR
AlbireoA.description: Beyond this point, <c=downside>orange parts will be disabled.</c>

AlbireoB.title: ORANGE STAR
AlbireoB.description: Beyond this point, <c=downside>blue parts will be disabled.</c>
